title: Brown University, Brookline shooter confessed in videos, DOJ says, as transcripts are released

title: State Rep. Chynah Tyler to pay $6K after spending campaign funds on personal uses, including takeout, salon visit
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Politics According to public records, the charges included $223 at a hair-braiding salon, various Uber Eats deliveries, and $100 for a AAA membership.
State Rep.
Chynah Tyler speaks during the inauguration of Suffolk District Attorney Kevin Hayden at Roxbury Community College Media Arts Center in 2023.

title: 4th Massachusetts child dies of flu
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Health The two children who died in Boston were both under the age of 2.

Lindsey Wasson / AP, File By Carson Lyle January 6, 2026 | 3:53 PM 1 minute to read A second young Boston child has died from the flu, the city announced Tuesday, bringing the Massachusetts pediatric death toll to four.
On Monday, the state Department of Public Health had announced Boston’s first pediatric flu death in over 10 years.

title: Karen Read’s SUV is going up for auction this month
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News The 2021 Lexus LX 570 will be auctioned off just over four years after John O’Keefe was found unresponsive on a snowy lawn in Canton.
Karen Read's SUV is pictured in front of the home in Canton where her boyfriend, Boston Police Officer John O'Keefe, was found unresponsive in the snow.
AP Photo/Michael Dwyer, File By Abby Patkin January 6, 2026 | 3:19 PM 2 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Damon and Affleck debate who’s the bigger Boston sports fan

title: Bill Belichick details how Chargers could be ‘in a lot of trouble’ against Patriots
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots A broken bone in Justin Herbert's hand and a banged up offensive line could be troublesome for Los Angeles.
Bill Belichick AP Photo/Ben McKeown The Patriots are on a completely different level than they were when the Chargers demolished them 40-7 at Gillette Stadium last December.
They’ve catapulted from last place in the AFC East to division champs, earning the right to host Los Angeles in the wild-card round on Sunday night.
